title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.101 - Oxidizing materials referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.101 - Oxidizing materials referenced to this section

State Regulations

Oxidizing materials listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 500 pounds gross
weight provided, however, such oxidizing materials are in outside containers of
50 pounds gross weight, or less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.101

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
